metadata.title: CVE-2021-44718 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: wolfSSL through 5.0.0 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service andinfinite loop in the client component by sending crafted traffic from aMachine-in-the-Middle (MITM) position. The root cause is that the clientmodule accepts TLS messages that normally are only sent to TLS servers.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
